<languages/> <translate> ==Modals== <!--T:1--> ''Use on the main game screen (only works if the player can access the feature)'' *Open the Farm Modal - '''F''' *Open the Hatchery Modal - '''H''' *Open the Oak Items Modal - '''O''' *Open the Underground Modal - '''U''' *Open the Poké Ball Selector Modal (number is the index [1-4] of the selector choice) - '''P + Number Key'''
==Miscellaneous Main Screen== <!--T:2--> ''Main game screen'' *Go to the previous route (by [[Route Statistics|Route Order]]) - '''-''' *Go to the next route (by [[Route Statistics|Route Order]]) - '''+/='''
===[[Farm]]=== <!--T:3--> ''Use with the Farm Modal open'' *Toggle the Shovel Item - '''S''' *Toggle the Plot Lock Option - '''L (or Shift + Click)'''
===[[Underground]]=== <!--T:4--> ''Use with the Underground Modal open'' *Switch to the Hammer Item - '''H''' *Switch to the Chisel Item - '''C''' *Use the Survey tool - '''S''' *Use the Bomb tool - '''B'''
===[[Oak Items]]=== <!--T:5--> ''Use with the Oak Items Modal open'' *Toggle item in the Oak Items menu - '''Number Keys 1-0 (corresponds to the number of the Oak Item)'''
==[[Dungeons]]== <!--T:6--> ''Use with the Dungeon Modal open (also works with the [[Safari Zone]] modal)'' *Move Up - '''W or Up Arrow Key (↑)''' *Move Left - '''A or Left Arrow Key (←)''' *Move Down - '''S or Down Arrow Key (↓)''' *Move Right - '''D or Right Arrow Key (→)''' *Interact with Chest/Boss - '''Space Key'''
==[[Towns & Cities]]== <!--T:7--> ''Use in Towns and Dungeons'' *Start first town content - '''Space Key''' *Start Elite 4/Champion Battle - '''1-5'''
==[[Shops]]== <!--T:8--> ''Use in Shops'' *Buy Item - '''B''' *Select Max Items - '''M''' *Reset Item Amount - '''R''' *Increase Item Amount - '''I'''
==Miscellaneous== <!--T:9--> ''Use anywhere'' *Force Save Game - '''Shift + S''' </translate>
